data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Shonan.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tosu's Riki Harakawa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Akimi Barada (Shonan) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
Akimi Barada of Shonan gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 17, Tosu have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 20, Goal! Shonan take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Akimi Barada.
Mitsuki Saito instrumental with a fine assist.
Tosu takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 22, Tosu are pushing forward but Ryang Yong-Gi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Tosu.
Throw-in Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 31, Tosu have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 34, Cho Dong-geon equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Daiki Matsuoka to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 39, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tosu have a dangerous throw-in.
Cho Dong-geon of Tosu is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Shonan takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Shonan take a 1-2 lead thanks to Hiroshi Ibusuki.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Tarik Elyounoussi.
The second-half is now underway.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
In the minute 46, Ryoya Morishita is on a sub for Ryang Yong-Gi for Tosu.
Shonan are coming forward and Mitsuki Saito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tosu are caught offside.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 49, Shonan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 54, Tosu drives forward and Cho Dong-geon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shonan pushes forward through Tarik Elyounoussi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 58, Daichi Hayashi is replacing Takeshi Kanamori for the home team.
Tosu make their third substitution with Yuta Higuchi replacing Cho Dong-geon.
Goal kick for Shonan at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
The away team replace Tarik Elyounoussi with Hiroto Nakagawa.
In the minute 62, Shonan make their second substitution with Temma Matsuda replacing Akimi Barada.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kaisei Ishii is replacing Fuchi Honda for the home team.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
Throw-in high up the field for Shonan in Tosu.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daiki Miya (Tosu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Shonan's Mitsuki Saito misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Daiki Matsuoka with Yohei Toyoda.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Tosu.
In the minute 75, Goal! Daichi Hayashi equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Tomoya Koyamatsu of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Tosu drives forward and Yohei Toyoda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Shonan takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 82, Naoki Yamada is on a sub for Mitsuki Saito for Shonan.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 89, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shonan make their fourth substitution with Shota Kobayashi replacing Satoshi Tanaka.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Shonan are whistled for offside.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
